Key Match Events: Igor Matanovic scored a goal in the 36th minute to equalize the match for Croatia
Andrej Kramaric scored a goal in the 70th minute to give Croatia a 2-1 lead
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia are second in League A Group 1 with six points, level with leaders Portugal
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland opened the scoring in the 32nd minute through Ryan Christie
Others: Croatia continued to press forward after the break
Scotland thought they had nabbed a late equaliser in the 95th minute but it was ruled offside after a VAR review
